verses.verse: And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> all that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>, and withal how he had <S%H2026>slain<s%> all the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Then <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, So let the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3254>me<s%>, and more <S%H7760>also<s%>, if I make not thy <S%H5315>life<s%> as the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of them by <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6965>that<s%>, he arose, and <S%H3212>went<s%> for his <S%H5315>life<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, which belongeth to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3240>left<s%> his servant <S%H5288>there<s%>.

But he himself <S%H1980>went<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> under <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H7574>juniper-tree<s%>: and he <S%H7592>requested<s%> for <S%H5315>himself<s%> that he might <S%H4191>die<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H7227>enough<s%>; <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah, take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>; for I am not <S%H2896>better<s%> than my <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And he <S%H7901>lay<s%> down and <S%H3462>slept<s%> under <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H7574>juniper-tree<s%>; <S%H4397>and<s%>, behold, an angel <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H6965>him<s%>, Arise and <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And he <S%H5027>looked<s%>, <S%H4763>and<s%>, behold, there was at his head a <S%H5692>cake<s%> baken on the <S%H7529>coals<s%>, and a <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>. And he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and laid him <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%>, because the <S%H1870>journey<s%> is too great for <S%H7227>thee<s%>.

And he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> in the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of that <S%H396>food<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> unto <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And he <S%H935>came<s%> thither unto a <S%H4631>cave<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H1697>there<s%>; and, behold, the word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came to <S%H559>him<s%>, and he said unto <S%H452>him<s%>, What doest thou here, Elijah?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have been <S%H7065>very<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> thine <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: and <S%H3498>I<s%>, even I only, am left; and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>, to take it <S%H3947>away<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. <S%H3068>And<s%>, behold, Jehovah passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H6561>rent<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and brake in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H5553>rocks<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was not in the <S%H7307>wind<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> an <S%H7494>earthquake<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was not in the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%>:

and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was not in the <S%H784>fire<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> a <S%H1827>still<s%> <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

And it was <S%H452>so<s%>, when Elijah <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3874>it<s%>, that he wrapped his <S%H6440>face<s%> in his <S%H155>mantle<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6607>in<s%> the entrance of the <S%H4631>cave<s%>. <S%H6963>And<s%>, behold, there came a voice unto <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, What doest thou <S%H452>here<s%>, Elijah?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have been <S%H7065>very<s%> <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> thine <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and <S%H3498>I<s%>, even I only, am left; and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>, to take it <S%H3947>away<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Go, <S%H7725>return<s%> on thy <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>: and when thou <S%H935>comest<s%>, thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H758>Syria<s%>;

and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> shalt thou <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> of <S%H65>Abel-meholah<s%> shalt thou <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to be prophet in thy <S%H5030>room<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H4422>pass<s%>, that him that escapeth from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> shall <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%>; and him that <S%H4422>escapeth<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> shall <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%>.

Yet will I <S%H7604>leave<s%> me <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all the <S%H1290>knees<s%> which have not <S%H3766>bowed<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and every <S%H6310>mouth<s%> which hath not kissed <S%H5401>him<s%>.

And he said unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Go back <S%H7725>again<s%>; for what have I done to <S%H6213>thee<s%>?

Then he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, and ministered unto <S%H8334>him<s%>.
